Title: Fbahunter Amazon Online Arbitrage Assistant

Description: Fbahunter Online Arbitrage Assistant is a Chrome extension designed to simplify your online arbitrage process. This extension allows you to perform profit, margin, and ROI (Return on Investment) calculations for products across all Amazon's target and source countries. It also identifies restricted products based on past experiences and highlights products that require Amazon’s approval.

Features:

Profit and Margin Calculations: Perform profit and margin calculations for your selected products to identify the most lucrative opportunities.

ROI Calculations: Calculate the return on investment (ROI) to foresee the profitability of your investments.

Tracking List and Favorites: Add the products you review to a tracking list and mark them as favorites for easy access.

Restricted Product Detection: Identify restricted products based on past experiences to ensure hassle-free selling.

Approval Required Products: Spot products that require Amazon’s approval to sell, ensuring a safe trading experience.

3PL Costs: Automatically display third-party logistics (3PL) costs based on the parameters you enter.

Product Comparisons: Perform product-based comparisons between selected source countries to find the best deals.

View Other Offers: View other offers for selected products to analyze the competitive landscape.

Optimize your online arbitrage process and make more profitable deals with Amazon Arbitrage Assistant. Try it now!
